channel.title: My simple blog - Articles
channel.description: Blog for collecting thoughts while learning to code. Used as a simple repository for future reference.

item.title: What Is Jekyll
item.description: ﻿When I first decided to start blogging, I heard about Jekyll and it was a simpler and improved version of Ghost (which also was an improved version of WordPress). As expected, I went straightaway to the Jekyll website to open an account to start blogging.

item.title: Welcome To Jekyll
item.description: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
